title: Query Parser Config
description: Configuration for SQL query parser selection for lineage and usage extraction.

QueryParserType.description: Type of SQL query parser to use for lineage and usage extraction. Auto mode is recommended for best results.

type.title: Query Parser Type
type.description:
Choose the SQL parser for lineage extraction:
• Auto (default): Automatically tries SqlGlot first, falls back to SqlFluff, then SqlParse. Recommended for best results.
• SqlGlot: High-performance parser with excellent dialect support. Falls back to SqlParse on failure.
• SqlFluff: Comprehensive parser with strong dialect support. Falls back to SqlParse on failure.
